section.name: Roadmap
section.p: This vision of mmm is to build an ECMS with mmm-content on top of the mmm-framework using the mmm-uit and all the other useful modules.
There is still a long way to go. Anyhow the first sub-projects are about to be released soon. This will include mmm-search and according parts of mmm-util.
The mmm-uit needs intensive improvements and web-support, etc.
The ECMS content module (OO-database layer) is NOT yet available. It is still unclear if JCR (JSR 170) will be used as generic API, because it sucks.
